body.name: FURNINXS Bookshelf, 5 Tier Bookcase Tall, Storage Ladder Shelf, Standing Shelf for Book/Living Room/Office, Rustic Brown
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 19 hrs 14 mins
features: Multifunctional Bookcase: The 5-tier bookcase provide ample storage space and can house any books, kitchen items, photos, gimcrack, etc.. It also can be served as display rack for show your precious porcelain sets, the finest glassware, and the unique collection.

Farmhouse Bookshelves: This industrial bookshelf is designed in the classic industrial furniture look. Combined glossy metal frame with rustic brown wood grain, this farmhouse standing shelf effortlessly integrate into any decoration style, suitable for your bedroom, living room, kitchen, office, hallway, etc.

Sturdy & Safe Ladder Shelves: Constructed with selected metal frame and particleboard, this bookshelf is built for long-lasting durability. Each shelf is 0.63 inch thick, which ensure its weight capacity up to 33lbs. The reinforced X-bracing at back prevents items from spilling over. The adjustable bottom feet increase stability and help level in the uneven floor. Additional strap will keep the shelf from wobbling.

Ideal Storage & Display Solution: Measured with 62.2*23.6*11.8 inch (H*L*W), the distance between each layer is 14 inches. This 5 tier bookshelf builds the perfect size that can assist you to create a vertical storage space at anywhere you want.

Easy-to-Install: You will enjoy the hassle-free installation of this standing bookshelf with the complete hardware set and step-by-step detailed instruction. If in case, you meet with trouble when install, just contact the FURNINXS after-sale customer service team, and we will offer in-time service for you.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: FURNINXS FNSS02 5 Tier Bookshelf| Maximize Your Home Space Would you like to have a storage shelf to make your home more neat and organized? FURNINXS 5-tier bookshelf can be your ideal choice. Our bookcase can be used as a nice decoration in your home and help you organize files, books, potting, decoration, etc. This tall bookshelf is suitable to be placed in the hall, living room, bedroom, balcony, office, etc.
Why Choose FURNINXS 5-Tier Bookcase? >> Sturdy Metal Frame >> "X" Crossbar to Increase Stability >> 5 Tier Bookshelf >> Anti-Toppling Device >> Easy to Assemble and Clean >> Adjustable Bottom Feet

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This corner shelving unit was exactly what I was looking for and needing for my body mist and lotions. It’s the perfect height and color. It fits perfectly in my bathroom corner. It’s not cheap looking and it’s super sturdy. Fairly easy to put together as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what we needed
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a corner shelf unit to raise our mesh WiFi unit higher up and this fit the bill. It was fairly easy to assemble, just don't tighten everything fully until it's all together. The dark color matches our table chairs and it is sturdy and tucks into the corner nicely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to set up. Holds great, didn’t even need to attach the wall anchor and I had a bigger plant at the top and no problems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent for the price
reviews.reviewText: I have similar shelves to this one but that exact model was unavailable so I went with the closest alternative. This unit is decent- very easy and quick to assemble even by one person but the quality is less than fantastic. While tightening one of the screws that secure the shelf to the frame, one of the frame tube walls caved in slightly; nothing catastrophic but still undesirable. The frame itself is thinner metal than my old unit and the shelves are supported only by the screws that pass through the frame and into the side of the particle board shelf. My old unit had a metal bar front and back where the shelf screwed down onto those bars. I wouldn't trust these shelves to hold a great deal of weight but since I don't intend to use them as bookshelves they should be adequate. Overall, this unit looks good, is reasonably stable, and while cheaply made, should fulfill its intended purpose without too much trouble. If you are of smaller stature and/or have limited strength, this may be ideal for you as it is light weight and easy to handle during assembly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid and sophisticated!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this bookcase as a temporary solution for my books. I set it up in my living room and it's been there ever since! I'll be keeping it as my official bookcase! I filled all shelves fully with thick hardcover books and it's sturdy and secure and doesn't shake at all. The wood and black metal give a chic vibe and add a cool touch to my room. All in all, great purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: This shelf is perfect for what we needed it for. It is sturdy and easy to put together. The shelves have nice color to them too. Great for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I needed a corner table or shelving for my entryway but didn't want to spend a ton. I came across this shelving and figured I'd give it a try. It arrived intact, was very easy to install and looks really nice! I've already gotten a few compliments on it. It's nice and sturdy as well. So far no complaints!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice looking stand. Fits perfectly in my corner.
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble, and looks really nice in any room. Matches my work desk.
